token_info.name: «ЗА РУЛЕМ»
token_info.description: @diakur | «ЗА РУЛЕМ» — A hypnotic toy from the Soviet Union, recreated with Three.js.  Principle of the game: The disc with roads and bridges rotates with the help of an electric motor. Under the disk there is a bar that can be swung left and right using the steering wheel. The little car is magnetized to the bar. When the disk starts to rotate, the car stays in place and can be steered using the steering wheel, until it crashes against a wall.
